interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Richsky Magnetic with Eyeliner Kit,5 Pairs Natural Looking Magnetic lashes,Easy to Wear False Eyelash Set,No Glue Needed and Waterproof.
Review Date: 2021/10/25
Store: RICHSKY
Average Rating: 2.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'RICHSKY', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.75 x 0.01 x 0.59 inches', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '5.75 x 0.01 x 0.59 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '724976709162'}
Review Text: I actually got these for a friend who had never tried magnetic lashes and always compliments mine.  I hadn't tried this particular set before either.  Unfortunately she really didn't like these and it made her go back to glue on lashes.  The magnets weren't very strong and the band that has the magnets was very stiff and difficult to get them to apply quickly.  The styles are very unnatural looking and so are the lashes, very shiny.  The liner I also very basic.  I would pass on this set and spend the money for a good pair.
Review Title: Too stiff, very faux
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
HAIRCUBE Natural Looking Short Blonde Wigs Pixie Cut Dark Root Ombre Blonde Wigs with Bangs Wigs for Women
HAIRCUBE
{'Material': 'Memory Fiber', 'Hair Type': 'Pixie Cut', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'HAIRCUBE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 7.8 x 3.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'aswig61-wm3045'}
I love this!  This is the best short wig I've come across. It looks so real, especially the coloring and the quality of the hair.  Straight from the box it was ready to go on and wear.  You can style it many different ways.  It has 3 clips inside and there is enough room to hide my long hair.  I absolutely recommend it.
Love! So natural looking, easy to style, great color
Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner Kit - 8 Pairs Invisible Magnetic False Eyelashes and Black Eyeliner of 2 Tubes Sets, Auchois 3D Reusable Natural Look Fake Eyelashes, Faux Mink Lashes Pack
AUCHOIS
{'Brand': 'AUCHOIS', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.2 x 5.7 x 0.78 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Latex Free', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '9.2 x 5.7 x 0.78 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BME001'}
This is a nice set for all the options you get and most look really natural.  They're decent pairs for the price.  I just don't prefer this thin magnetic strip, I like having individual magnets on the lashes.  The thin strip is not as strong magnetically and you can't re-use these as often because it's difficult to keep the strip clean. The liner is basic like all the other kits have, I have found a different liner I really like that I use with all my lashes.  Personally I wouldn't order these again.
Natural looking, thin magnetic strip
Hair Extensions Tape in Human Hair Moresoo Real Hair Extensions Glue in Seamless Double Sided Tape 18inch Human Tape in Hair Extensions 20Pieces 50Grams Blonde Hair Extensions
Moresoo
{'Brand': 'Moresoo', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Normal', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 4 x 1.5 inches; 11.22 Ounces'}
I'm really happy with these extensions, the hair is beautiful.  The color is fantastic and really matches mine.  Each weft has good thickness and this really feels like a full 50g.  It added a lot of fullness to my hair.  The tape is great, they've stayed in for many washes now.  I don't think I've had to replace any of them yet.  The hair has stayed healthy looking and feeling.  I will definitely order these again.  I recommend.
Gorgeous hair color & quality
Richsky Magnetic with Eyeliner Kit,5 Pairs Natural Looking Magnetic lashes,Easy to Wear False Eyelash Set,No Glue Needed and Waterproof.
RICHSKY

I actually got these for a friend who had never tried magnetic lashes and always compliments mine.  I hadn't tried this particular set before either.  Unfortunately she really didn't like these and it made her go back to glue on lashes.  The magnets weren't very strong and the band that has the magnets was very stiff and difficult to get them to apply quickly.  The styles are very unnatural looking and so are the lashes, very shiny.  The liner I also very basic.  I would pass on this set and spend the money for a good pair.
Too stiff, very faux
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor short wigs with a natural appearance, complemented by an interest in hair extensions for fuller styles. They maintain a critical eye for aesthetic appeal across various personal care products, now including false eyelashes.
- **Quality Focus:** Consistently values high quality and realistic aesthetics, evident in their recent negative experience with a false eyelash product. The user is increasingly cautious about product effectiveness and overall appeal.
- **Ease of Use:** A strong preference for user-friendly items remains, with an emphasis on convenience in application processes across hair and makeup products.
- **Styling Versatility:** Seeks versatile options that allow for creativity in styling, reflected in their diverse interests in hair and false eyelashes. 
- **Positive Experiences:** While they have encountered satisfaction with hair extensions, their recent experience with magnetic lashes highlighted performance issues, leading to a more discerning stance on product recommendations.
- **Recommendation Behavior:** Displays a willingness to recommend high-quality products that meet expectations but is becoming more selective based on personal experience and feedback from others, indicative of a thoughtful and informed approach to sharing product insights.

Overall, this user is committed to natural-looking, high-quality personal care solutions, prioritizing ease of use and versatility, while refining their standards based on recent interactions and evaluations.
